articles.content: OKLAHOMA CITY, Okla.  Oklahoma Hall of Fame coach Patty Gasso wanted people to know she wasn't trying to show up anybody when she inserted freshman All-American righthander Jordy Bahl to get the fina… [+6822 chars]
